text: a great story needs more than lead
characters which is wonderful because
the spotlight has never been comfortable
for me many of my most fulfilling
experiences in life have been on the
sidelines fostering community around a
dinner table listening celebrating
successes or helping pick up the pieces
and make sense of failure and loss these
are not individually striking moments
yet the piece I find in them speaks its
own truth about Who I am what I am
called to do I keep a prayer by the
theologian John Bailey on the wall of my
room my unwillingness to believe that
you have called me to a small work and
my brother to a great one o Lord forgive
the prayer is a reminder that I live my
one life and a community of people
striving in their own wild and precious
ways that my peers have their own dreams
many nobler than my own they are the
lead characters in their own stories
perhaps in need of a willing supporting
cast and so with my life I will find
contentment on the sidelines offering my
small work to assist my brother and
sister and their great ones tell me what
is it you plan to do with your one wild
and precious life
[Music]
you
